attributes.action: publicly state that no MP who has fiddled their expenses will be recommended for elevation to the Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the Prime Minister to state clearly and publicly that any MP who had to repay expenses will not be recommended for an honour and move to the Lords when they resign from the commons, or are thrown out by the electorate.  No MP who was required by the Kelly commission, or public opinion and the exposure by the press, to repay expenses should continue in public legistlative life by being recommended for elevation to the Lords.  
Furthermore, the Prime Minister should ask for similar pledges from the other party leaders, that they also will not recommend MPs for honours who have abused the expenses system.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
